channel.title: The BLANK Podcast
channel.description:
Broadcasting from an apartment in a small corner of Podcast Land, one couple with nothing better to do sift through life’s sludge-pile of mind-numbing entertainment to bring you the hidden gems that lie beneath!
This is… The BLANK Podcast!
Join us as we review pop culture, recommend more useless crap to add to your busy life, and keep you informed of stuff that you probably already know about. Right here on… The BLANK Podcast!
channel.itunes:subtitle: We talk about...stuff.
channel.itunes:author: Mike Fray
channel.itunes:summary:
Broadcasting from an apartment in a small corner of Podcast Land, one couple with nothing better to do sift through life’s sludge-pile of mind-numbing entertainment to bring you the hidden gems that lie beneath!
This is… The BLANK Podcast!
Join us as we review pop culture, recommend more useless crap to add to your busy life, and keep you informed of stuff that you probably already know about. Right here on… The BLANK Podcast!

item.title: The BLANK Podcast - Episode 5
item.description: EPISODE 5 NOTES “Cock-A-Doodle-Doo” We're back with over 30 minutes of love to give! Oh, and Happy Turkey Day, everyone! Sorry for the delay. Like I said last time personal issues sprang up, which made it hard to get this show out—we actually recorded this in late October, but it took me forever to edit. In this episode we wing it with no prep time whatsoever (it was the wife's idea, so blame her!) So enjoy the show and have a wonderful week! TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.) 01. We have a long (ha-ha) discussion about male genitalia. 02. *Movie Time!: We spill the beans on Zack and Miri Make a Porno. 03. The wife shows me some love...and then spoils it by ranting about having to cook for me. EPISODE LINKS 1. http://www.nakedworldrecords.com/lpen.htm (WARNING: Contains nudity!) 2. http://www.zackandmiri.com/
item.dc:creator: Mike Fray

“Cock-A-Doodle-Doo”

Like I said last time personal issues sprang up, which made it hard to get this show out—we actually recorded this in late October, but it took me forever to edit. In this episode we wing it with no prep time whatsoever (it was the wife's idea, so blame her!) So enjoy the show and have a wonderful week!
TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.)
01. We have a long (ha-ha) discussion about male genitalia.
02. *Movie Time!: We spill the beans on Zack and Miri Make a Porno.
03. The wife shows me some love...and then spoils it by ranting about having to cook for me.
EPISODE LINKS
1. http://www.nakedworldrecords.com/lpen.htm (WARNING: Contains nudity!) 2. http://www.zackandmiri.com/

item.title: The BLANK Podcast Ep 4
item.description: EPISODE 4 NOTES “Don’t Hiatus” Yes, we’re going on hiatus for a little while. Personal issues have strung up that need to be dealt with and it’s hard to do that when you have a show to run and you’re the only person doing it (i.e. editing, posting, etc.) Don’t worry. We’ll have a few companion pieces following soon after this one to keep you busy. So enjoy the show and have a wonderful week! TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.) 01. Listener Mail: Wayne from The Wayne CrazyTrain Show podcast does the honors of being the first fan to leave us a voice message…three times! Mike reads some very nice message board comments from two of our fans, ODB and Dr. Pus. 02. *Today’s e-News Report: What else but The Dark Knight movie? 03. *Really Weird Stuff: “What Are the Odds?” list. 04. *Craigslist: Michelle makes a confession. 05. Useless Facts: Property tax 06. *At the Station: The very first live report from Michelle via cell phone. 07. The Big Lots Adventure: DVDs, chips, Suave, and “the name debate.” 08. *Movie Time!: We spill all the beans on Jumpers, Vantage Point and 10,000 B.C. Listener beware! 09. The Lottery: Did we win…? 10. *The Stoner Corner: Mary Jane couldn’t be with us this time around, so we pulled a clip from Youtube.com to teach you the finer points of “getting high for the first time”. 11. Mish Mash: Iron Man, the Horroretc podcast, Hancock, Wanted, The Dark Knight, Zack and Miri Make a Porno, Kabluey and Adam Sandler. EPISODE LINKS 1. http://wbztv.com/national/Cops.Gripe.911.2.271099.html (wacky 911 call statistics) 2. http://waynecrazytrain.podomatic.com/ and http://dr-pus.podomatic.com/ 3. The Dark Knight http://movies.yahoo.com/mv/news/ap/20080720/121658682000.html, http://www.movieweb.com/movies/film/81/4381/boxoffice/, http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20080803/ap_en_mo/box_office, http://omg.yahoo.com/news/complete-list-the-dark-knight-claims-8-box-office-records/11037, http://movies.yahoo.com/mv/news/eo/20080730/121746906000.html 4. http://www.divinecaroline.com/article/22323/52471-odds- (What Are the Odds?) 5. http://www.craigslist.org 6. http://www.biglots.com 7. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xoyXoH63Dc (clip used in “The Stoner Corner” segment) 8. http://ironmanmovie.marvel.com/, http://kingstownted.podomatic.com/, http://www.hancock-movie.com, http://www.wantedmovie.com/, http://thedarkknight.warnerbros.com/, http://www.zackandmiri.com/, http://www.kabluey.com and http://www.adamsandler.com

item.title: The BLANK Podcast Ep 3
item.description: EPISODE 3 NOTES “New Stuff” Yep! We have a few new segments running around loose in this episode, so beware! Today we get to hear from Mary Jane and her theory as to why gas is so high (no pun intended), there’s some “really weird stuff” out there, and we have a LIVE report from Michelle at the gas station. So what are you waiting for?! Listen to this or we’ll track you down and tickle you until you piss yourself, girly boy! TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.) 1. *Craigslist Posts: Missed Connections (BBW stalker), Rants (annoying women) and Strictly Platonic (Goth Gurl and Michelle’s new friend.) 2. *Really Weird Stuff: Used toilet/sink and a Mandolin. 3. Dear BLANK Podcast: Politically incorrect advice (ha-ha) from us. Got a question? Write us at blankpodcast@gmail.com 4. *At the Station: A live report from Michelle via cell phone. 5. The Stoner Corner: Mary Jane has a conspiracy theory about high gas prices and talks about naked people on bicycles and vaginal rejuvenation. EPISODE LINKS 1. http://www.break.com/index/burger_king_911.html (funny 911 call) 2. http://www.craigslist.org 3. http://www.ghostworld-themovie.com and (for the comic book) http://www.fantagraphics.com 4. http://www.atomicsuburbia.com (promo) 5. http://www.uexpress.com/dearabby 6. http://www.zbs.org (promo) SPECIAL THANKS Intro music by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at www.indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1832. More info at www.27milesmusic.com and www.myspace.com/27miles. Sound effects and music loops from Soundsnap at www.soundsnap.com. ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our internet home, so stop by if you want the latest news, updates and contact info at www.myspace.com/blankpodcast. And check out our Community Board at http://blankpodcast.yuku.com! We’re also on Twitter (https://twitter.com/blankpodcast) and NetVibes (http://www.netvibes.com/blankpodcast). WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) URL: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com RSS Feed: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml iTunes URL: www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 FeedBurner.com Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcast Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcastboard Mediafly.com URL: www.mediafly.com/Podcasts/Feeds/The_BLANK_Podcast Podfeed.net URL: http://www.podfeed.net/podcast/The+BLANK+Podcast/14902 CONTACT INFO Questions? Comments? E-mail us at blankpodcast@gmail.com or leave a voice message at www.snapvine.com/blankpodcast. (You don’t have to register to leave a voice message, either. Just go to our Home page at Snapvine, click on the “Leave a Voice Comment” button under our profile photo and follow the simple instructions that follow. That’s it!) You can also leave a voice message using Skype by dialing 1 (206) 777-0951 – charges may apply.

item.title: The BLANK Podcast Ep 2
item.description: EPISODE 2 NOTES “We’re Still Here (?)” Yes indeed! Amazingly Michelle and I are still pumping out shows and loving every minute of it—I say “amazing” b/c, as you all know, Michelle isn’t into podcasts like I am. Anyway, we’ve got a good show for you this time around. So sit back and get ready for some fun! TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.) 1. *Really Weird Stuff: MyRoommateIsADick.com 2. Today’s e-News Report: “Long-Nailed Women Angry with iPhone” and “Crushing the Little Guy” 3. Statistically Speaking 4. The Slang Dictionary: “Slow Your Roll” 5. *Craigslist Posts 6. On the Go: Big Lots and Barbeque EPISODE LINKS 1. http://myroommateisadick.blogspot.com/ 2. http://tech.yahoo.com/blogs/hughes/29052 3. http://www.craigslist.org 4. http://midnighthorrorshow.podOmatic.com 5. http://www.reelhorror.com 6. http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=slow+your+roll 7. http://www.biglots.com 8. http://www.3heroes.net/ SPECIAL THANKS Intro music provided by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at: http://indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1823. More info at: http://ww.27milesmusic.com and http://www.myspace.com/27miles Sound effects and music loops were provided by SoundSnap at: http://www.soundsnap.com/ ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our Internet home, so be sure to stop by if you want to find out about the latest news, updates and contact info at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast. And check out our Community Board at: http://blankpodcast.yuku.com WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW iTunes URL: http://www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) URL: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com RSS Feed: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml FeedBurner.com Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcast Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcastboard Medifly.com URL: http://www.mediafly.com/Podcasts/Feeds/The_BLANK_Podcast CONTACT INFO Questions? Comments? E-mail us at: blankpodcast@gmail.com or leave a voice message at: http://www.snapvine.com/blankpodcast. (You don’t have to register to leave a voice message, either. On our Home page at Snapvine, click on the “Leave a Voice Comment” button under our profile photo and follow the instructions that follow.) You can also leave us a message using Skype by dialing 1(206)777-0951 (charges may apply.)

item.title: The BLANK Podcast Ep 1
item.description: EPISODE 1 NOTES “An Accident Waiting to Happen” Is it? You be the judge! In our first episode we have an actual format! Michelle and I talk about everything from really weird stuff to Jizz Chips. Did we do as good as (or better than) the zero episode? You tell us! Thanks! TOPICS (FYI: * denotes a permanent show segment.) 1. Patting ourselves on the back (but only for the first six minutes) 2. Celebrity voice mail (?) 3. *Really Weird Stuff: eBay (petrified thumb rock) and Craigslist (Lego guy) 4. Dude’s underarm hair 5. Michelle is a mixing pot of ethnicity and nicknames 6. *At the Station: Stupid people at the pump 7. Jizz Chips, 2 Drunks and a Podcast (Again…?!?) and a rant 8. Southern boy speak and the mystery of Danny T 9. Number One with a Bullet promo EPISODE LINKS 1. http://cgi.ebay.com/petrified-thumb-rock-weird-stuff- BEWARE_W0QQitemZ290238710321QQcmdZViewItem?_trksid=p3286.m20.l1116 2. http://www.markyoshimotonemcoff.com/Books/N1B 3. http://www.myspace.com/2drunksandapodcast 4. http://midnighthorrorshow.podOmatic.com 5. http://greatestvideogamepodcastever.podomatic.com/ 6. http://www.craigslist.org SPECIAL THANKS Intro music provided by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at: http://indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1823. More info at: http://ww.27milesmusic.com and http://www.myspace.com/27miles Sound effects and music loops were provided by SoundSnap at: http://www.soundsnap.com/ ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our Internet home, so be sure to stop by if you want to find out about the latest news, updates and contact info at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW iTunes (Do I really have to explain this one? Didn’t think so.) URL Address #1: http://www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) URL Address: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com RSS Feed: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml FeedBurner.com (A podcatcher.) Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcast Medifly.com (Another podcatcher.) http://www.mediafly.com/Podcasts/Feeds/The_BLANK_Podcast CONTACT INFO Questions? Comments? E-mail us at: blankpodcast@gmail.com or leave a voice message at: http://www.snapvine.com/blankpodcast. (You don’t have to register to leave a voice message, either. On our Home page at Snapvine, click on the “Leave a Voice Comment” button under our profile photo and follow the instructions that follow.) You can also leave us a message using Skype by dialing 1(206)777-0951 (charges may apply.)

item.title: The BLANK Podcast Ep 0
item.description: EPISODE 0 NOTES “Test Drive Down the Information Highway” It's our first episode! This isn't an actual show, in a way. It's sort of a "test drive" as we discuss what needs to be put into the [real] first episode. Let us know what you think! TOPICS: 1. Testing the sound "quality" (C...U...P?) 2. 1-900-Michelle 3. 2 Drunks and a Podcast get props 4. Podcasting fan...sort of 5. Segway: Driving or riding? 6. Movies: The Spirit 7. Training day with roaches 8. A word from our sponser: Boner Pill X 9. Mike, the REAL podcast fan 10. Pussy whipped and crying inside EPISODE LINKS 1. http://www.segway.com 2. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_Nicole_Smith 3. http://www.myspace.com/2drunksandapodcast 4. http://www.mycityscreams.com SPECIAL THANKS Intro music provided by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at: http://indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1823. More info at: http://ww.27milesmusic.com and http://www.myspace.com/27miles Sound effects and music loops were provided by SoundSnap at: http://www.soundsnap.com/ ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our Internet home, so be sure to stop by if you want to find out about the latest news, updates and contact info at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW iTunes (Do I really have to explain this one? Didn’t think so.) URL Address #1: http://www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) item.dc:creator: Mike Fray
item.itunes:summary:
EPISODE 0 NOTES
“Test Drive Down the Information Highway”
It's our first episode! This isn't an actual show, in a way. It's sort of a "test drive" as we discuss what needs to be put into the [real] first episode. Let us know what you think!
TOPICS:
1. Testing the sound "quality" (C...U...P?) 2. 1-900-Michelle 3. 2 Drunks and a Podcast get props 4. Podcasting fan...sort of 5. Segway: Driving or riding? 6. Movies: The Spirit 7. Training day with roaches 8. A word from our sponser: Boner Pill X 9. Mike, the REAL podcast fan 10. Pussy whipped and crying inside
EPISODE LINKS
1. http://www.segway.com
2. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_Nicole_Smith
3. http://www.myspace.com/2drunksandapodcast
4. http://www.mycityscreams.com
SPECIAL THANKS
Intro music provided by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at: http://indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1823. More info at: http://ww.27milesmusic.com and http://www.myspace.com/27miles
Sound effects and music loops were provided by SoundSnap at: http://www.soundsnap.com/
ABOUT US
Our MySpace page is our Internet home, so be sure to stop by if you want to find out about the latest news, updates and contact info at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast

item.title: Movie Time! - Episode 3
item.description: Movie Time! #3 Welcome to the third episode of our companion piece. The Movie Time! segment is where Michelle and I discuss *DUH!* movies (past and present—both in theaters and on DVD). In this episode we review the DVDs Fool’s Gold; Definitely, Maybe and Nancy Drew. W A R N I N G !!! This segment will contain spoilers, so if you have not seen any of the movies mentioned here then we advise you NOT to download this! item.title: Movie Time! - Episode 1
item.description: "Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain but it takes character and self control to be understanding and forgiving." --Benjamin Franklin Welcome to the first in a long series of companion pieces. The Movie Time! segment is where Michelle and I discuss *DUH!* movies (past and present—both in theaters and on DVD). W A R N I N G !!! This segment will contain spoilers, so if you have not seen any of the movies mentioned here then we advise you NOT to download this! In this episode we review Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, The Strangers, The Incredible Hulk, The Happening and You Don't Mess with the Zohan. EPISODE LINKS 1. http://www.indianajones.com 2. http://www.thestrangers.net 3. http://www.incrediblehulk.marvel.com (and check out http://comicbookmovie.com/news/articles/4543.asp to see an awesome CGI Hulk by artist Jonas Thornqvist!) 4. http://www.thehappeningmovie.com 5. http://www.youdontmesswiththezohan.com 6. http://www.apple.com/trailers/ SPECIAL THANKS TO SoundSnap at http://www.soundsnap.com/ for the use of their sound effects and music loops, Pod Safe Audio for the additional background music at http://www.podsafeaudio.com and Listen to a Movie at http://power.listentoamovie.com/ for the Raiders of the Lost Ark sound clips and end credits music. ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our Internet home, so be sure to stop by if you want to find out about the latest news, updates and contact info at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast. You can also go to our Message Board to join our community at http://blankpodcast.yuku.com/. WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW iTunes URL Address: http://www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) URL Address: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com RSS Feed: http://blankpodcast.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml FeedBurner.com (A podcatcher.) Feed: http://feeds.feedburner.com/blankpodcast Medifly.com (Another podcatcher.) http://www.mediafly.com/Podcasts/Feeds/The_BLANK_Podcast Mevio.com (Podcast hoster.) http://theblankpodcast.mevio.com/ CONTACT INFO Questions? Comments? E-mail us at: blankpodcast@gmail.com or leave a voice message at: http://www.snapvine.com/blankpodcast. (You don’t have to register to leave a voice message, either. On our Home page at Snapvine, click on the “Leave a Voice Comment” button under our profile photo and follow the instructions that follow.) You can also leave us a message using Skype by dialing 1(206)777-0951 (charges may apply.)

item.title: The Cutting Room Floor - Ep 1
item.description: This is our first episode of The Cutting Room Floor, our segment where you get to hear unedited material that didn't "make the cut". Outtakes and extended scenes are just some of the things you'll hear in this show. Enjoy! SPECIAL THANKS Sound effects and music loops from Soundsnap at www.soundsnap.com. ABOUT US Our MySpace page is our internet home, so stop by if you want the latest news, updates and contact info at www.myspace.com/blankpodcast. And check out our Community Board at http://blankpodcast.yuku.com! WHERE TO GO TO LISTEN TO OUR SHOW iTunes URL: www.itunes.com/podcast?id=283850058 PodOmatic.com (Where our show is hosted.) item.title: The BLANK Podcast: Promo - The Clean Version
item.description: Here's the other promo that I mentioned in the Naughty Version show notes. This one is a lot shorter and a lot cleaner (it's so clean a nun could listen to it and still feel good about herself the next day). FYI: Feel free to play any of our promos, but do us a favor and send yours so we can play it sometime! Contact us at: blankpodcast@gmail.com or go to our MySpace page at: http://www.myspace.com/blankpodcast The sound effects and music loops that were used were provided by Soundsnap at: http://www.soundsnap.com/

item.title: The BLANK Podcast: Promo - The Naughty Version
item.description: Before we released Episode #0 (you heard it, right?) I wanted to make sure that we had a promo ready to go. What you are about to hear is the first idea that popped in my head--shows you just how sick I am :o) I wanted to make a promo that conveyed my love for podcasts, our weird/corny/unfunny explicit humor (gotta warn the parents that this ain't for the kiddies, after all!) and give out the usual contact info. But I wanted to do it in a fun way that you might not have heard before. Well, Michelle wasn't as entertained by it as I was (I think she said something about watching old people cross the street was more entertaining), so I decided to try and think of something else as quickly as possible b/c I was ready to post our first episode. So I threw together the music version (sorry...I know it's not that great) and was going to delete this one but then I thought "Screw it" and decided to post it anyway. Let me know what you think at blankpodcast@gmail.com or www.myspace.com/blankpodcast. Special thanks to Soundsnap at www.soundsnap.com for the use of their sound effects and music loops! Mevio {Mevio-f99a0916add1fa73de89de6f7cf4d468}
item.dc:creator: Mike Fray

item.title: The BLANK Podcast: Promo - The Music Version
item.description: Hello everyone out there in Podcast Land! The BLANK Podcast is about to burst onto the scene with our first episode! Until then...here's a little something to whet your appitite! (FYI: More promos will follow very soon. And feel free to play our promos on your show! Just do us a favor and send us yours so we can play it! Thanks.) Check us out at www.myspace.com/blankpodcast for more information about the show. Our intro music was provided by the band 27 Miles with their song “Where I Belong”, which can be found at: http://indiepodcasting.com/details.asp?ArtistID=1823. You can also visit the band’s official website at: http://www.27milesmusic.com or their MySpace page at: http://www.myspace.com/27miles Have a good one! Fray My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-8ec06a5038f42d4e2b68156da5fc9acc}
item.dc:creator: Mike Fray
